txt.en: The wood-trolls known as the Taurogrim still haunt much of Eryn Lasgalen. If Gorgar rouses them to battle, they will pose a great threatâ€¦.\n\nYour mission is to defeat the Taurogrim in Grazadh-gropor.
You have been tasked with defeating the Taurogrim in Grazadh-gropor.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'Do you know of the Taurogrim? They are fearsome wood-trolls native to Mirkwood, or Eryn Lasgalen as the Elves have renamed it. My scouts have seen a band of Orcs entering one of their lairs, Grazadh-gropor, in Misthallow. I fear this may be Gorgar sending emissaries to rouse the Taurogrim to war! We must not allow this to happen! I task you with entering Grazadh-gropor and defeating the Taurogrim you find there!'
Your mission is to defeat the Taurogrim in Grazadh-gropor.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Grazadh-gropor.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'Well done! The Men of the Vales will be glad to know they need not fear an ambush from the forest while a war rages in the north, and we dwarves need not fear the Taurogrim's foul magic on the battlefield!'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
